eventList.title: Talk Shop
eventList.blurb: A conversation about the good, the bad, and the crazy of running your own business.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: Debt vs. Equity
eventList.blurb: What IS equity, exactly? Is debt actually a bad thing? Is one better or worse than the other for me? Join us and a panel of speakers from both sides of the equation as we tackle these questions and more.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: The Role of Brick and Mortar in the Digital Economy
eventList.blurb: Join our panelists in exploring the changing function of physical space as e-commerce redefines the customer and audience experience.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: The Importance of Building a Brand
eventList.blurb: Brand is a word that gets thrown around a lot, but what does it actually mean? Join our panelists in discussing the importance of brand and what establishing a solid one can do for your company.
